channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Fantastic Flavours
channel.desc: Ainsley explores the flavours of South Asia - known for its colourful and exciting cuisine - as guests Lisa Snowdon and Donna Preston cook their favourite dishes.

channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: This Morning
channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Loose Women
channel.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Tony Audenshaw, Tamzin Outhwaite and Phil Tufnell all trying to 'say what they see.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Hoping to win big money are married couple Trevor and Steph from Castle Donington, salsa-dancing brothers Lloyd and Lionel, and St Albans couple Sophie and Joe. Hosted by Adil Ray.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Deal or No Deal
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a special edition of the iconic game show as Strictly Come Dancing's Motsi Mabuse and Dancing on Ice's Oti Mabuse join forces to take on the Banker.

channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Andy from Flintshire, Sue from Lancaster, Kirsty from Bristol and Arjun from Solihull join forces in the hope that their four brains can beat a Chaser's.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Ross confronts Charity, Ray puts doubts in Dylan's head, and Belle dumps Kammy.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Aadi's loved ones hatch a plan, Abi appeals to Tracy's better nature, Theo schemes to scupper Todd's night out, and Asha reflects on the events of a traumatic shift.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ridley
channel.desc: Detective drama. When a local wife and mother goes missing in a picturesque village, Ridley and Carol are called in to investigate with the hope of finding her.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK

channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Cold Case Forensics
channel.desc: Murder of Stephen Lawrence. The murder of Stephen Lawrence remained unsolved until world-leading forensic scientist Dr Angela Gallop and her team looked again at the evidence.

channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Cooking with the Stars
channel.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen host as four new stars - Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Culculoglu, Shaun Wright-Phillips and Kelly Hoppen - cook for their loved ones with their mentors.
